extendedInfo.description: You controle a chicken who fights against evil using his skill and his weapons which he improves by collecting gold and experience during gameplay.To support us and encourage us to improve, please give a fair rating and a comment on the Android Market!Chicken Massacre is a two dimensional platform game in which you take the role of a chicken that fights against all types of mobs such as wasps, worms, bears and much more. At the end of each level you have to face a boss.*** Something about us ***We, Deltac Development, are two 17 years old guys from the Netherlands. Chicken Massacre is our first game and this is the BETA version. We would appreciate it if you could take the time to give us a feedback of what you liked and what you didn't like. We will change alot of stuff and add extra levels. What we will add in the future:- In every new version -+ Better animations and graphics+ Performance improvements+ Bugfixes- In version 1.1.4 Beta -+ Theme music+ Ingame-related sounds such as gunshots and explosionsSo remember: rate & comment!*** Some things to keep in mind ***+ We are just starting developing mobile applications, and as we do it in our spare time, developing takes more time than at a giant studio :)+ Chicken Massacre is still in BETA and is released on the android market for the sole purpose of feedback from all you guys! If any problems occur during gameplay, please leave your phone type (for example HTC Desire), android version (f.e. 2.2), when the problem occurs (f.e. when you press Play) and what happens (force close, screen freeze etc..).+ We appreciate all the feedback you can give us, our mail is provided at the android market (deltacdev@gmail.com) and you can always comment and rate all our apps on the android market!*** Compability ***This applications has been developped using HTC Desire and is best played at a resolution of 800x480 or an equivalent screen. We are using emulators to simulate other phones as much as possible in our endeavours to make Chicken Massacre compatible for all touchscreen phones.*** To make sure we dont get sued ***In using this application you are deemed to have read and agreed to the following terms and conditions:Usage of this application.Usage of this application or game is at your own risk. We exclude all representations and warranties relating to this application and its contents. We also exclude all liability for damages arising out of or in connection with your use of this application. This includes without limitation, direct loss, loss, damage caused to your systems and programs and the data thereon or any other direct or indirect, consequential and incidental damages.The above exclusions and limitations apply only to the extent permitted by law.Confidentiality and privacyWe will not sell, share, or rent your personal information to any third party. All data gathered by this application is required and is essential for this application to function properly. All permissions that this application requires to function accordingly are listed on the Android Market or can be found by going to Settings > Applications > Chicken Massacre.To view the complete terms and conditions visit:http://www.deltacdev.com/terms-and-conditions/index.htmlÂ© Deltac Development 2011

reviews.comment: Game seems interesting controls are horrible have to cover most of the screen with your fingers to be able to play
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s a good game for your first attempt keep them coming though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: LGOptimusS. WTF is up with broken game!? Click play and it screen slides to left and the main menu comes back up!?! Will NOT pass the menu! CANT PLAY!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Get to boss and then nothing. Oh, and no sound? Wtf?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great game guys. Don\'t listen to any kind of bad reviews from anyone. Obviously it needs improvement but making a decent app isn\'t a cake walk. Keep it up. Can\'t wait for next update!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: This was a 1st game? Not bad! but moving left/right controls in2 the bottom left & right corners would greatly improve gameplay. I hav really small hands & i still had a real lot of trouble with the controls. Because of the way i had 2 position both hands on the bottom left corner of my ph i kept hitting the phs power off button so it was impossible 2 play without my ph turning off. Any1 with adult size hands will hav probs but a few little changes & sm goofy sound effects would make it pretty cool
reviews.author: Justine Penny

reviews.title: WOW!!!!
reviews.comment: This an amazing game and I\'m not saying that because I\'m Dutch but because it brings back memories and is also a legendary game. The reasons are because I have small hands and the controls are a perfect fit! The game runs smoothly and there are no ads!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: jess review
reviews.comment: looked cool but turned out very boring...
